title: A Fibration of Fermat Surface in Characteristic
content: Let S be a Fermat surface of degree 5 and let k be an algebraically closed field of characteristic p = 2. We give a fibration ƒ: S → {P}_k^1 and investigate the geometric properties of fiber of ƒ. Furthermore, we investigate the fibration-preserving automorphisms group Aut_{{P}_k^1}(S) of ƒ. We obtain that Aut_{{P}_k^1}(S) is a p-group of order 256.
